task.title: Editing Workflow Reports
task.shortdesc: You can edit Workflow Reports from either the projects dashboard or your account dashboard. You can only edit a workflow report if you created it or if the creator of the report granted you or one of your user roles permission to do so.

step.cmd: Under the right side Workflow Reports column, click on the pencil icon beside the object that you would like to edit.
Make any necessary changes to the Workflow Report.
